__e: Data, I can understand how this could happen to the Ornarans.
No, Data, I simply mean that I can't give you any advice.
Mr. Data, it is my responsibility, somehow, to see that this ship is guided to safety.
Data, you're my liaison to the bridge.
Data, wait for me in the corridor.
Mr Data, is any of this possible?
Data can move pretty fast, but based on what we know about the Borg, they shouldn't be able to move any faster than you or I.
The only one he talks to is your friend, Data.
-Mr. Data and I are returning to the ship.
Cmdr Data and I have much to do.
Data and I are the only ones aboard this ship capable of doing it.
Considering the sensitive nature of my equipment, you'll understand if I request that only Mr. Data be allowed to see it.
- What have you done to Cmdr Data?
